TEXT.German: Mylord, die Vorzüge der Freiheit in der Neuen Welt lassen auch die Gebildeten aufhorchen. Es heißt, dass einer dieser Studierten sich unseren Kolonien anschließen würde, wenn wir ihm die überfahrt bezahlen.
TEXT.Italian: Mylord, the benefits of liberty in the New World obviously also causes well educated people to leave their homes and to sail into the New Word. It seems that a graduate wishes to join our own colonies, in case we are willing to pay the passage for him.
TEXT.Spanish: Mylord, the benefits of liberty in the New World obviously also causes well educated people to leave their homes and to sail into the New Word. It seems that a graduate wishes to join our own colonies, in case we are willing to pay the passage for him.

TEXT.English: For the sake of variety we need a well educated man in our colonies. We will not remain a colony of workers and farmers. Issue the bill of exchange!
TEXT.French: For the sake of variety we need a well educated man in our colonies. We will not remain a colony of workers and farmers. Issue the bill of exchange!
TEXT.German: Wir könnten zur Abwechslung mal einen Akademiker brauchen. Wir wollen ja nicht eine Kolonie von Arbeitern und Bauern bleiben. Stellt ihm den Wechsel aus!
TEXT.Italian: For the sake of variety we need a well educated man in our colonies. We will not remain a colony of workers and farmers. Issue the bill of exchange!
TEXT.Spanish: For the sake of variety we need a well educated man in our colonies. We will not remain a colony of workers and farmers. Issue the bill of exchange!

TEXT.English: To be honest, we don't need another dandy who wastes our time and money. To establish this colony we need people who can tackle the challanges of the life here in the New World.
TEXT.French: To be honest, we don't need another dandy who wastes our time and money. To establish this colony we need people who can tackle the challanges of the life here in the New World.
TEXT.German: Lieber nicht, wir sind gerade etwas knapp bei Kasse und diese Studierten sind doch alles Aufschneider, die nur den ganzen Tag im Salon verbringen und kluge Reden schwingen. Ich brauche Leute, die auch anpacken können.
TEXT.Italian: To be honest, we don't need another dandy who wastes our time and money. To establish this colony we need people who can tackle the challanges of the life here in the New World.
TEXT.Spanish: To be honest, we don't need another dandy who wastes our time and money. To establish this colony we need people who can tackle the challanges of the life here in the New World.

TEXT.English: A Master Train Oil Cooker wants to join %s2_city.
TEXT.French: A Master Train Oil Cooker wants to join %s2_city.
TEXT.German: In %s2_city möchte sich uns ein Meistertrankocher anschließen.
TEXT.Italian: A Master Train Oil Cooker wants to join %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: A Master Train Oil Cooker wants to join %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Mylord, whaling along our coasts promises high profits. Lucky as we are one of the merchant vessels recently picked up a Master Train Oil Cooker in Europe, who likes to start a new life in the colonies. Shall we engage him?
TEXT.French: Mylord, whaling along our coasts promises high profits. Lucky as we are one of the merchant vessels recently picked up a Master Train Oil Cooker in Europe, who likes to start a new life in the colonies. Shall we engage him?
TEXT.German: Mylord, der Walfang vor unseren Küsten würde gute Gewinne versprechen. Wie es der Zufall will, hat der Kapitän eines Handelsschiffes in Europa einen Meistertrankocher an Bord genommen, der hier ein neues Leben beginnen möchte. Sollen wir im eine Anstellung geben?
TEXT.Italian: Mylord, whaling along our coasts promises high profits. Lucky as we are one of the merchant vessels recently picked up a Master Train Oil Cooker in Europe, who likes to start a new life in the colonies. Shall we engage him?
TEXT.Spanish: Mylord, whaling along our coasts promises high profits. Lucky as we are one of the merchant vessels recently picked up a Master Train Oil Cooker in Europe, who likes to start a new life in the colonies. Shall we engage him?

TEXT.English: Actually we always wanted to do this, only the right time for doing this had never opened up. Give him the job!
TEXT.French: Actually we always wanted to do this, only the right time for doing this had never opened up. Give him the job!
TEXT.German: Perfekt, das wollten wir doch schon lange in Angriff nehmen. Stellt ihn ein!
TEXT.Italian: Actually we always wanted to do this, only the right time for doing this had never opened up. Give him the job!
TEXT.Spanish: Actually we always wanted to do this, only the right time for doing this had never opened up. Give him the job!

TEXT.English: Oh my god, what a stupid idea! The pirates cruising along our coasts are already waiting for such fat prey! We have not enough military vessels to protect our whaling ships and without procetion this is a rather senseless endeavor. We cannot employ him.
TEXT.French: Oh my god, what a stupid idea! The pirates cruising along our coasts are already waiting for such fat prey! We have not enough military vessels to protect our whaling ships and without procetion this is a rather senseless endeavor. We cannot employ him.
TEXT.German: Bei den vielen Piraten, die hier in dieser Gegend zur Zeit kreuzen? Wir haben nicht die Mittel, um alle unsere Walfänger von Kriegschiffen bewachen zu lassen. Und ohne Schutz ist das ein sinnloses Unterfangen. Wir können ihn derzeit nicht gebrauchen.
TEXT.Italian: Oh my god, what a stupid idea! The pirates cruising along our coasts are already waiting for such fat prey! We have not enough military vessels to protect our whaling ships and without procetion this is a rather senseless endeavor. We cannot employ him.
TEXT.Spanish: Oh my god, what a stupid idea! The pirates cruising along our coasts are already waiting for such fat prey! We have not enough military vessels to protect our whaling ships and without procetion this is a rather senseless endeavor. We cannot employ him.

TEXT.English: A trading company intends to develop %s2_city as basis for their whaling activities.
TEXT.French: A trading company intends to develop %s2_city as basis for their whaling activities.
TEXT.German: Eine Handelskompanie möchte %s2_city als Basis für ihren Walfang ausbauen.
TEXT.Italian: A trading company intends to develop %s2_city as basis for their whaling activities.
TEXT.Spanish: A trading company intends to develop %s2_city as basis for their whaling activities.

TEXT.English: Mylord, a powerful trading company intends to develop one of our colonies as basis for their whaling activities in this area. We should all benefit from this deal. They are promising ships, men and construction material for new buildings, in case we grant to protect them and to expose taxes for whale fat and train oil.
TEXT.French: Mylord, a powerful trading company intends to develop one of our colonies as basis for their whaling activities in this area. We should all benefit from this deal. They are promising ships, men and construction material for new buildings, in case we grant to protect them and to expose taxes for whale fat and train oil.
TEXT.German: Mylord, eine mächtige Handelskompanie möchte eine unserer Kolonien als Basis für ihren Walfang ausbauen. Davon würden wir sicher profitieren. Sie versprechen uns Schiffe, Männer und Baumaterial für neue Gebäude zu liefern, wenn wir im Gegenzug für Ihren Schutz sorgen und die Zölle auf Walspeck sowie Tranöl eine Weile aussetzen.
TEXT.Italian: Mylord, a powerful trading company intends to develop one of our colonies as basis for their whaling activities in this area. We should all benefit from this deal. They are promising ships, men and construction material for new buildings, in case we grant to protect them and to expose taxes for whale fat and train oil.
TEXT.Spanish: Mylord, a powerful trading company intends to develop one of our colonies as basis for their whaling activities in this area. We should all benefit from this deal. They are promising ships, men and construction material for new buildings, in case we grant to protect them and to expose taxes for whale fat and train oil.

TEXT.English: Agreed, the region and our purse will benefit from this deal. However, I assume that we will need to calm down the reaction of our neighbours.
TEXT.French: Agreed, the region and our purse will benefit from this deal. However, I assume that we will need to calm down the reaction of our neighbours.
TEXT.German: Das kommt uns sehr gelegen, die Region und unsere Geldbörse werden davon sehr profitieren. Also einverstanden, setzen Sie die entsprechenden Verträge auf. Die Steuern setz ohnehin der König fest. Mit unseren Nachbarn werden wir uns schon arrangieren.
TEXT.Italian: Agreed, the region and our purse will benefit from this deal. However, I assume that we will need to calm down the reaction of our neighbours.
TEXT.Spanish: Agreed, the region and our purse will benefit from this deal. However, I assume that we will need to calm down the reaction of our neighbours.

TEXT.English: These poor animals. They need our protection but not our harpoons. Furthermore our neighbours do already whaling in this area. I will not jeopardise our relationship.
TEXT.French: These poor animals. They need our protection but not our harpoons. Furthermore our neighbours do already whaling in this area. I will not jeopardise our relationship.
TEXT.German: Diese armen Tiere. Sie benötigen unseren Schutz, nicht unsere Harpunen. Außerdem betreiben unsere Nachbarn hier bereits Walfang. Ich möchte die guten Beziehungen nicht gefährden.
TEXT.Italian: These poor animals. They need our protection but not our harpoons. Furthermore our neighbours do already whaling in this area. I will not jeopardise our relationship.
TEXT.Spanish: These poor animals. They need our protection but not our harpoons. Furthermore our neighbours do already whaling in this area. I will not jeopardise our relationship.

TEXT.English: Privateers are the pest of the seas.
TEXT.French: Privateers are the pest of the seas.
TEXT.German: Freibeuter werden zur Plage der Meere.
TEXT.Italian: Privateers are the pest of the seas.
TEXT.Spanish: Privateers are the pest of the seas.

TEXT.English: Mylord, our neighbours have sent a diplomat. Hiy Excellency is very upset about the privateer activities around his harbours and the increasing losses of merchant vessels. He awaits that we revoke their letters of marque.
TEXT.French: Mylord, our neighbours have sent a diplomat. Hiy Excellency is very upset about the privateer activities around his harbours and the increasing losses of merchant vessels. He awaits that we revoke their letters of marque.
TEXT.German: Mylord, Unsere Nachbarn haben einen Diplomaten geschickt. Seine Exzellenz ist sehr erbost über die zunehmende Anzahl von Schiffensverlusten durch Freibeuter. Man verlangt von uns, den Freibeutern ihre Kaperbriefe zu entziehen.
TEXT.Italian: Mylord, our neighbours have sent a diplomat. Hiy Excellency is very upset about the privateer activities around his harbours and the increasing losses of merchant vessels. He awaits that we revoke their letters of marque.
TEXT.Spanish: Mylord, our neighbours have sent a diplomat. Hiy Excellency is very upset about the privateer activities around his harbours and the increasing losses of merchant vessels. He awaits that we revoke their letters of marque.

TEXT.English: I agree, these rough fellows have been very usefull in the past. But now their success made them arrogant. They have started attacks on our own merchant vessels. We will revoke their letters of marque and pay them out.
TEXT.French: I agree, these rough fellows have been very usefull in the past. But now their success made them arrogant. They have started attacks on our own merchant vessels. We will revoke their letters of marque and pay them out.
TEXT.German: Ich stimme zu. Bisher waren diese rauen Gesellen ganz ntzlich. Aber ihre Erfolge haben sie überheblich gemacht. Mir liegen Berichte vor, dass vereinzelt sogar bereits unsere eigenen Handelsschiffe angegriffen wurden. Wir werden die Anzahl der ausgegebenen Kaperbriefe reduzieren und die Freibeuter ausbezahlen.
TEXT.Italian: I agree, these rough fellows have been very usefull in the past. But now their success made them arrogant. They have started attacks on our own merchant vessels. We will revoke their letters of marque and pay them out.
TEXT.Spanish: I agree, these rough fellows have been very usefull in the past. But now their success made them arrogant. They have started attacks on our own merchant vessels. We will revoke their letters of marque and pay them out.

TEXT.English: We can't do anything. These letters of marque have been issued by our own admiralty and the king. And the private investors will not willy-nilly waive their rights to capture foreign merchant vessels.
TEXT.French: We can't do anything. These letters of marque have been issued by our own admiralty and the king. And the private investors will not willy-nilly waive their rights to capture foreign merchant vessels.
TEXT.German: Ja nun, dagegen können wir nichts machen. Die Kaperbriefe werden von der Admiralität auf Gehei seiner Majestät ausgegeben. Und die privaten Eigner werden nicht gern auf ihre Profite verzichten wollen.
TEXT.Italian: We can't do anything. These letters of marque have been issued by our own admiralty and the king. And the private investors will not willy-nilly waive their rights to capture foreign merchant vessels.
TEXT.Spanish: We can't do anything. These letters of marque have been issued by our own admiralty and the king. And the private investors will not willy-nilly waive their rights to capture foreign merchant vessels.

TEXT.English: Great, our strategy takes effect! We won't stop it now. Furthermore we will issue more letters of marque to challenge them.
TEXT.French: Great, our strategy takes effect! We won't stop it now. Furthermore we will issue more letters of marque to challenge them.
TEXT.German: Ha, also zeigt die Strategie Wirkung! Wir werden vor diesen Bastarden nicht zu Kreuze kriechen. Wir werden weitere Kaperbriefe ausstellen, um deren Handel noch mehr zu schwächen.
TEXT.Italian: Great, our strategy takes effect! We won't stop it now. Furthermore we will issue more letters of marque to challenge them.
TEXT.Spanish: Great, our strategy takes effect! We won't stop it now. Furthermore we will issue more letters of marque to challenge them.

TEXT.English: Private investors change from buccaneering to legal investments in merchant vessels.
TEXT.French: Private investors change from buccaneering to legal investments in merchant vessels.
TEXT.German: Private Eigner stellen ihre Freibeuter auf Handelsschiffahrt um.
TEXT.Italian: Private investors change from buccaneering to legal investments in merchant vessels.
TEXT.Spanish: Private investors change from buccaneering to legal investments in merchant vessels.

TEXT.English: Mylord, the private investors of the ships which letters of marque have been revoked have converted their privateers into merchant vessels and will not enhance our merchant fleet.
TEXT.French: Mylord, the private investors of the ships which letters of marque have been revoked have converted their privateers into merchant vessels and will not enhance our merchant fleet.
TEXT.German: Mylord, die Eigner der Freibeuter, deren Kaperbriefe wir eingezogen haben, haben ihr Schiff in ein Handelsschiff umgerüstet und werden von nun an unsere Handelsflotte verstärken.
TEXT.Italian: Mylord, the private investors of the ships which letters of marque have been revoked have converted their privateers into merchant vessels and will not enhance our merchant fleet.
TEXT.Spanish: Mylord, the private investors of the ships which letters of marque have been revoked have converted their privateers into merchant vessels and will not enhance our merchant fleet.

TEXT.English: Really good. This will reassure our neighbours and strengthen our trade.
TEXT.French: Really good. This will reassure our neighbours and strengthen our trade.
TEXT.German: Sehr gut, das wird unsere Nachbarn beruhigen und unseren Handel stärken.
TEXT.Italian: Really good. This will reassure our neighbours and strengthen our trade.
TEXT.Spanish: Really good. This will reassure our neighbours and strengthen our trade.

TEXT.English: Privateers will be mercilessly hunted.
TEXT.French: Privateers will be mercilessly hunted.
TEXT.German: Freibeuter werden gnadenlos gejagt.
TEXT.Italian: Privateers will be mercilessly hunted.
TEXT.Spanish: Privateers will be mercilessly hunted.

TEXT.English: Mylord, one of our new privateers has been taken by the marine of our neighbours. The buccaneers have been hanged without mercy.
TEXT.French: Mylord, one of our new privateers has been taken by the marine of our neighbours. The buccaneers have been hanged without mercy.
TEXT.German: Mylord, der Freibeuter, den wir kürzlich mit einem neuen Kaperbrief ausstatteten, wurde von der Marine unserer Konkurenten aufgebracht und die Freibeuter wegen Piraterie gehängt.
TEXT.Italian: Mylord, one of our new privateers has been taken by the marine of our neighbours. The buccaneers have been hanged without mercy.
TEXT.Spanish: Mylord, one of our new privateers has been taken by the marine of our neighbours. The buccaneers have been hanged without mercy.

TEXT.English: This is a pitty, but we cannot change it. However, they did some profitable raids.
TEXT.French: This is a pitty, but we cannot change it. However, they did some profitable raids.
TEXT.German: Tja, leider nicht zu ändern. Wenigstens konnten sie einige profitable Kaperfahrten durchführen.
TEXT.Italian: This is a pitty, but we cannot change it. However, they did some profitable raids.
TEXT.Spanish: This is a pitty, but we cannot change it. However, they did some profitable raids.

TEXT.English: A native from a tribe nearby wishes to join our colony.
TEXT.French: A native from a tribe nearby wishes to join our colony.
TEXT.German: Ein Ureinwohner möchte sich euch schließen.

TEXT.English: Commander, a native wishes to settle down at our city. He fled from his tribe instead to fight againt their enemies, that means he is a coward.
TEXT.French: Commander, a native wishes to settle down at our city. He fled from his tribe instead to fight againt their enemies, that means he is a coward.
TEXT.German: Kommandant, ein eingeschüchterter Indianer steht demütig in Eurer Gesindestube. Sein Stamm habe ihn verstoßen, weil er bei einem Überfall von Conquistadores auf sein Dorf geflohen war, statt zu kämpfen. Er bittet um Eure Gnade und eine neue Chance.

TEXT.English: Okay, give hin a bible.
TEXT.French: Okay, give hin a bible.
TEXT.German: Dies sei ihm gewährt. Weist ihm eine Arbeit zu.

TEXT.English: No, catch him and sell him to the tribe. This will strengthen our relationship with the natives.
TEXT.French: No, catch him and sell him to the tribe. This will strengthen our relationship with the natives.
TEXT.German: Nehmt ihn gefangen und verkauft ihn an den Stamm, das wird unsere Beziehungen auf lange Sicht stärken.

TEXT.English: You get a converted native.
TEXT.French: You get a converted native.
TEXT.German: Ein Konvertierter Ureinwohner schließt sich Euch an.

TEXT.English: Commander, a converted native wishes to settle down at our city.
TEXT.French: Commander, a converted native wishes to settle down at our city.
TEXT.German: Kommandant, ein Missionar reist derzeit durch unsere Kolonien. Sein indianischer Diener, der ihn begleitet, will ihn verlassen, weil er die unsittlichen Annäherungen seines Herrn satt hat.

TEXT.English: Okay.
TEXT.French: Okay.
TEXT.German: Unter christlicher Nächstenliebe verstehe ich etwas anderes. Selbstverständlich gewähren wir dem Indianer Zuflucht.

TEXT.English: You get a converted native.
TEXT.French: You get a converted native.
TEXT.German: Ein Konvertierter Ureinwohner schließt sich Euch an.

TEXT.English: Commander, a converted native has visited our Lord's house. He is very impressed by our faith in God and wishes to settle down at our city.
TEXT.French: Commander, a converted native has visited our Lord's house. He is very impressed by our faith in God and wishes to settle down at our city.
TEXT.German: Kommandant, der Gemeindepfarrer fragt, ob ihr Euch eines Indianerjünglings annehmen könnt. Er habe Vater und Mutter durch die Blattern verloren und stehe jetzt ganz alleine da.

TEXT.English: Commander, a converted native has visited our Lord's house. He is very impressed by our faith in God and wishes to settle down at our city.
TEXT.French: Commander, a converted native has visited our Lord's house. He is very impressed by our faith in God and wishes to settle down at our city.
TEXT.German: Kommandant, ein Indianer wurde in Eurem Gotteshaus bei dem Versuch erwischt, den silbernen Messkelch zu stehlen. Die Rothaut ist reuig und möchte ihre Schuld durch tätige Buße begleichen.

TEXT.English: Commander, a converted native has visited our Lord's house. He is very impressed by our faith in God and wishes to settle down at our city.
TEXT.French: Commander, a converted native has visited our Lord's house. He is very impressed by our faith in God and wishes to settle down at our city.
TEXT.German: Kommandant, der Gemeindepfarrer konnte im Beichtstuhl eine Rothaut davon überzeugen, dass seine halbwilde Natur nicht gottgefällig ist und nur durch harte Arbeit unter Eurem strengen Kommando gezügelt werden könne.

TEXT.English: Commander, a converted native has visited our Lord's house. He is very impressed by our faith in God and wishes to settle down at our city.
TEXT.French: Commander, a converted native has visited our Lord's house. He is very impressed by our faith in God and wishes to settle down at our city.
TEXT.German: Kommandant, ein vorbeiziehender Indianer hat der Anblick der bunten Glasfenster in Eurem Gotteshaus bezaubert. Er sah das Morgenlicht durch sie hindurch in seine Seele leuchten, meint er. Nun möchte er unter uns Weißen leben.

TEXT.English: Commander, a converted native has visited our Lord's house. He is very impressed by our faith in God and wishes to settle down at our city.
TEXT.French: Commander, a converted native has visited our Lord's house. He is very impressed by our faith in God and wishes to settle down at our city.
TEXT.German: Kommandant, ein Indianer erlebte beim zufälligen Besuch unseres Gottesdienstes eine Vision. Er sah den Heiland mit einem Flammenschwerte am Altar stehen, in der Linken trug er den abgeschlagenen Kopf eines Wolfes. Ehrfürchtig möchte sich die Rothaut nun unserem Kampfe anschließen.

TEXT.English: Commander, a converted native has visited our Lord's house. He is very impressed by our faith in God and wishes to settle down at our city.
TEXT.French: Commander, a converted native has visited our Lord's house. He is very impressed by our faith in God and wishes to settle down at our city.
TEXT.German: Kommandant, ein junger Indianer bittet Euch, ihm das Lesen beizubringen, damit er in unserem Gotteshaus die Heilige Schrift studieren kann. Im Gegenzug bietet er an, überall anzupacken, wo Not am Mann ist.

TEXT.English: Commander, a converted native has visited our Lord's house. He is very impressed by our faith in God and wishes to settle down at our city.
TEXT.French: Commander, a converted native has visited our Lord's house. He is very impressed by our faith in God and wishes to settle down at our city.
TEXT.German: Kommandant, eine Rothaut möchte Manitou abschwören und stattdessen unserem Herrn Jesus Christus dienen.

TEXT.English: Commander, a converted native has visited our Lord's house. He is very impressed by our faith in God and wishes to settle down at our city.
TEXT.French: Commander, a converted native has visited our Lord's house. He is very impressed by our faith in God and wishes to settle down at our city.
TEXT.German: Kommandant, ein Indianerjüngling hat sich in die Statue der Heiligen Jungfrau Maria verliebt, die in unserem Gotteshaus steht. Er möchte nun in unserer Gemeinde leben, um stets in ihrer Nähe zu sein.

TEXT.English: Commander, a converted native has visited our Lord's house. He is very impressed by our faith in God and wishes to settle down at our city.
TEXT.French: Commander, a converted native has visited our Lord's house. He is very impressed by our faith in God and wishes to settle down at our city.
TEXT.German: Kommandant, wir haben eine Rothaut erwischt, die in den Keller unseres Gotteshauses eingebrochen und ein ganzes Fässchen unseres Messweines ausgesoffen hat. Der Bursche ist reuig und will seine Schuld durch Dienste abtragen.

TEXT.English: Okay.
TEXT.French: Okay.
TEXT.German: Wir werden uns um ihn kümmern.

TEXT.English: A forest fire sparked by lightning has raged across the land near %s2_city.
TEXT.French: A forest fire sparked by lightning has raged across the land near %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Viele Bürger von %s2_city verlieren bei den Bränden ihr Hab und Gut. Die Menschen sind empört.
TEXT.Italian: Un incendio forestale, causato da un fulmine, ha devastato il territorio vicino a %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: Un incendio forestal causado por un rayo ha asolado las tierras aledañas a %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Playing children from %s2_city sparked a fire in the nearby forest and went home without stamping out the fire. Many acres of forest are burnt-down due to these brats!
TEXT.French: Playing children from %s2_city sparked a fire in the nearby forest and went home without stamping out the fire. Many acres of forest are burnt-down due to these brats!
TEXT.German: Kommandant, ein Bursche aus %s2_city und seine Maid wollen heiraten, doch sind ihre Väter zwei rivalisierende Köhler und einander spinnefeind. Die störrischen Waldschraten wollen den Beiden nicht ihren Segen geben. Nun hat sich das verzweifelte Pärchen im Forst versteckt und droht, ein Feuer zu legen, um die Alten zu erpressen. Die Bürger fürchten, ein Waldbrand könne die ganze Gegend verwüsten, und bitten Euch einzugreifen.
TEXT.Italian: Tragedia nei pressi di %s2_city: è scoppiato un incendio in un villaggio e si è propagato alla vicina foresta, devastando il territorio per chilometri.
TEXT.Spanish: La tragedia se ha cebado con %s2_city, pues un incendio en la aldea se ha propagado al bosque, y ha chamuscado una gran superficie de tierra.

TEXT.English: Organize a replanting effort.
TEXT.French: Organize a replanting effort.
TEXT.German: Schickt den Köhlern je einen Batzen Gold und mein Versprechen, den Liebenden das Hochzeitsbankett zu spendieren. Mammon macht missvergnügte Männer mürbe.
TEXT.Italian: Organizza un rimboschimento.
TEXT.Spanish: Que empiecen las tareas de repoblación forestal.

TEXT.English: We are too pressed to spare any aid.
TEXT.French: We are too pressed to spare any aid.
TEXT.German: Wie heißt diese Posse - "Romeo und Julia für Hinterwändler"? Die sollen ihre Streitigkeiten selber regeln.
TEXT.Italian: Siamo troppo sotto pressione per inviare aiuti.
TEXT.Spanish: Estamos demasiado apurados como para prestarles ayuda.

TEXT.English: A forest fire sparked by lightning has raged across the land near %s2_city.
TEXT.French: A forest fire sparked by lightning has raged across the land near %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Viele Bürger von %s2_city verlieren bei den Bränden ihr Hab und Gut. Die Menschen sind empört.
TEXT.Italian: Un incendio forestale, causato da un fulmine, ha devastato il territorio vicino a %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: Un incendio forestal causado por un rayo ha asolado las tierras aledañas a %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Playing children from %s2_city sparked a fire in the nearby forest and went home without stamping out the fire. Many acres of forest are burnt-down due to these brats!
TEXT.French: Playing children from %s2_city sparked a fire in the nearby forest and went home without stamping out the fire. Many acres of forest are burnt-down due to these brats!
TEXT.German: In %s2_city haben ein paar übermütige Burschen dem Dorfnarren eingeredet, durch den nahen Forst streife ein Werwolf, der es auf ihn höchstpersönlich abgesehen habe. Daraufhin hat der verängstigte Tölpel im Wald ein Feuer gelegt, um die Bestie zu verbrennen. Der Ostwind hat die Flammen entfacht, und eine Feuerwalze rast durch das Land. Die Todeshitze droht viele Hektar in rußige Asche zu verwandeln.
TEXT.Italian: Tragedia nei pressi di %s2_city: è scoppiato un incendio in un villaggio e si è propagato alla vicina foresta, devastando il territorio per chilometri.
TEXT.Spanish: La tragedia se ha cebado con %s2_city, pues un incendio en la aldea se ha propagado al bosque, y ha chamuscado una gran superficie de tierra.

TEXT.English: Organize a replanting effort.
TEXT.French: Organize a replanting effort.
TEXT.German: Verpflichtet so viele helfende Hände wie Ihr findet, um die Feuersbrunst zu löschen.
TEXT.Italian: Organizza un rimboschimento.
TEXT.Spanish: Que empiecen las tareas de repoblación forestal.

TEXT.English: We are too pressed to spare any aid.
TEXT.French: We are too pressed to spare any aid.
TEXT.German: Schlimme Kunde. Schnell! Spurt euch! Ich brauche sofort einen Schnaps gegen den Schrecken.
TEXT.Italian: Siamo troppo sotto pressione per inviare aiuti.
TEXT.Spanish: Estamos demasiado apurados como para prestarles ayuda.

TEXT.English: The word is that in %s2_city a lazy Admial eats the governor out of house and home.
TEXT.French: The word is that in %s2_city a lazy Admial eats the governor out of house and home.
TEXT.German: Man munkelt, dass ein unttiger Admiral durch seine Gelage in %s2_city dem rtlichen Statthalter die Haare vom Kompf frisst.
TEXT.Italian: The word is that in %s2_city a lazy Admial eats the governor out of house and home.
TEXT.Spanish: The word is that in %s2_city a lazy Admial eats the governor out of house and home.

TEXT.English: Mylord, the new Admiral who arrived recently eats and drinks more than we can tolerate and spents more time with women than with the new recruits. His banquets are common talk. We have to do something to stop it.
TEXT.French: Mylord, the new Admiral who arrived recently eats and drinks more than we can tolerate and spents more time with women than with the new recruits. His banquets are common talk. We have to do something to stop it.
TEXT.German: Mylord, einer unserer neu bestallten Admirle feiert lieber und labt sich an Wein und Frauen, als dass er unseren jungen Matrosen Seemannschaft beibringt. Seine Gelage sind schon Stadtgesprch. Wir mssen etwas unternehmen, so etwas ist schlecht fr die Moral.
TEXT.Italian: Mylord, the new Admiral who arrived recently eats and drinks more than we can tolerate and spents more time with women than with the new recruits. His banquets are common talk. We have to do something to stop it.
TEXT.Spanish: Mylord, the new Admiral who arrived recently eats and drinks more than we can tolerate and spents more time with women than with the new recruits. His banquets are common talk. We have to do something to stop it.

TEXT.English: Ah, what the heck! He was at sea for a such a long time. He needs to enjoy his time onshore. Our storage is absolutely full. However, we need to keep an eye on him.
TEXT.French: Ah, what the heck! He was at sea for a such a long time. He needs to enjoy his time onshore. Our storage is absolutely full. However, we need to keep an eye on him.
TEXT.German: Ach was, der Mann war lange auf See. Ist doch verstndlich, dass er sich ein wenig austoben muss. Lasst ihm den Spa. Unsere Speicher sind doch prall gefllt. Aber wir behalten ihn im Auge.
TEXT.Italian: Ah, what the heck! He was at sea for a such a long time. He needs to enjoy his time onshore. Our storage is absolutely full. However, we need to keep an eye on him.
TEXT.Spanish: Ah, what the heck! He was at sea for a such a long time. He needs to enjoy his time onshore. Our storage is absolutely full. However, we need to keep an eye on him.

TEXT.English: Ah, what the heck! If he drills his recruits with the same dedication I'm fine with it. He is a tough guy. I'll pay his bill.
TEXT.French: Ah, what the heck! If he drills his recruits with the same dedication I'm fine with it. He is a tough guy. I'll pay his bill.
TEXT.German: Wenn er hinterher die jungen Matrosen mit der gleichen Hingabe ausbildet, wie er jetzt dem Wein zuspricht, soll's mir recht sein. Ich werde seine Rechnung persnlich begleichen. Bedenkt, was er fr unsere junge Marine fr einen Nutzen hat!
TEXT.Italian: Ah, what the heck! If he drills his recruits with the same dedication I'm fine with it. He is a tough guy. I'll pay his bill.
TEXT.Spanish: Ah, what the heck! If he drills his recruits with the same dedication I'm fine with it. He is a tough guy. I'll pay his bill.

TEXT.English: Absolutely correct. We will give him a ship. Sea air is the best way to deal with a binge and he can prove his good seamanship. We have a sloop in port. He will take command of this sloop. Issue the sailing order!
TEXT.French: Absolutely correct. We will give him a ship. Sea air is the best way to deal with a binge and he can prove his good seamanship. We have a sloop in port. He will take command of this sloop. Issue the sailing order!
TEXT.German: Ihr habt vollkommen recht, so geht es nicht weiter. Wir werden ihm ein Schiff geben. Seeluft ist das beste Mittel gegen Suferei. Da kann er mal zeigen, dass er noch nicht all seine Seemannschaft versoffen hat. Es liegt doch eine Sloop im Hafen. Die kann er nehmen. Fertigt nur gleich die Segelorder aus!
TEXT.Italian: Absolutely correct. We will give him a ship. Sea air is the best way to deal with a binge and he can prove his good seamanship. We have a sloop in port. He will take command of this sloop. Issue the sailing order!
TEXT.Spanish: Absolutely correct. We will give him a ship. Sea air is the best way to deal with a binge and he can prove his good seamanship. We have a sloop in port. He will take command of this sloop. Issue the sailing order!

TEXT.English: In %s2_city the navy equips a sloop. It seems that the Admiral will get his sailing order soon.
TEXT.French: In %s2_city the navy equips a sloop. It seems that the Admiral will get his sailing order soon.
TEXT.German: In %s2_city rstet die Marine eine neue Sloop aus. Der Admiral wird wohl bald seine Segelorder erhalten.
TEXT.Italian: In %s2_city the navy equips a sloop. It seems that the Admiral will get his sailing order soon.
TEXT.Spanish: In %s2_city the navy equips a sloop. It seems that the Admiral will get his sailing order soon.

TEXT.English: But it seems that the governor in %s2_city is a generous man.
TEXT.French: But it seems that the governor in %s2_city is a generous man.
TEXT.German: Aber der Statthalter in %s2_city ist offenbar ein grozgiger Mann.
TEXT.Italian: But it seems that the governor in %s2_city is a generous man.
TEXT.Spanish: But it seems that the governor in %s2_city is a generous man.
